summary.en-US: Shows a QR-code of the current page (PNG, copy & download).

description.en-US:
QR-Fox is a lightweight Firefox WebExtension that instantly generates QR codes for any webpage you're viewing. Simply click the extension icon or press Alt+Q to open a popup displaying the QR code of the current page URL.

Features:
• Generate QR codes with a single click
• Copy QR codes to clipboard
• Download QR codes as PNG files
• Keyboard shortcut support (Alt+Q)
• No external dependencies or permissions beyond activeTab
• Fast and lightweight

Perfect for quickly sharing URLs, testing QR code scanning, or any situation where you need a QR code representation of your current webpage.

release_notes.en-US: Initial release of QR-Fox - a simple and efficient QR code generator for Firefox.

screenshots.caption: QR-Fox popup displaying a QR code for the current page with copy and download options
